labels.bottomText2: If you wish to send this e-mail to more than one recipient, put a comma or semi-colon between separate e-mail addresses in the "Recipient's E-mail" box below.
labels.bottomText1: Your e-mail address will not be sold or used for promotional purposes. It is simply used so the recipient knows who is recommending the product.
labels.inputErrorText: This field is required. Please enter a value.
labels.emailinputFormat: Please ensure recipients email address is formatted correctly
labels.successMsg: Your email has been successfully sent.
